answers.answer: there is a specific test to identify HCV.  Abnormal liver tests are common in diabetics because of fatty liver
fatty liver is very common.  i do not think there is anything to worry about.

question: How does one get hepatitis C?I oringinally went to a G.I about some rectal bleeding but when i had a colonoscopy the G.I found abnormalities in my liver, with bloodwork done the results were the enzymes in my liver are elevated. Could it mean that I might have hepatitis? I am a diabetic so i'm not sure if my diabetes plays a role in this.
title: concerned
